page.title: 12Brownies
page.content: In Chew Magna there are two Brownie packs. One meets on Mondays and the other on Wednesdays. 11 girls from the Primary School go on Wednesdays from 6.30-8.00 p.m. You can be enrolled as a Brownie at age 7 when you are given a promise badge.You are also given a certificate, a county badge,a pack name badge and a Six emblem.You have to know your Brownie promise and the Brownie law. At Brownies we make presents for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Christmas and Easter. In the summer we go to the field to pick flowers or play rounders. We also play games such as Captain's Coming,Ladders and Cat and Mouse. We have been to Brownie Camp and have also taken part in the 75th Girl Guides' anniversary pageant in Bath.
